/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, are adorned with red and blue signs, adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The street itself is a hive of activity, filled with cars and pedestrians going about their day. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, providing a serene backdrop to the busy street scene below.
